name: Villa
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The villa has an elegant, luxurious atmosphere with the scent of fine furnishings and the sound of refined conversation and the rustle of sophisticated social gatherings. The air carries the promise of upscale hospitality and the essential nature of luxury accommodation, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of high society and the importance of maintaining standards of elegance and comfort for distinguished guests.
